about_data.title: Introduction
about_data.content: Hello, my name is Berat Kamali and I'm an applied informatics student studying development. I have a passion for technology and a keen interest in exploring new tools and technologies to build innovative solutions.

education.context: Currently studying Applied Informatics at HoGent, specializing in Mobile & Web Development.
Acquired my highschool diploma for Accounting and Informatics (TSO).

work.context: Served as a salesman selling electronics and insurances.

about_data.title: Future goals
about_data.content: Information Technology (IT) is a field drawn by continuous change, where staying updated and adapting quickly are essential.\n\n By commiting to lifelong learning, I aim to contribute innovative projects and remain at the cutting edge inside the IT field.
